page.title: 01Intro
page.content: Grid Reference:06320330-Witton & Ridlington.Area of survey consists of civil parish of Witton & Ridlington,with small areas of Honing,Bacton,Walcott & Edingthorpe in S.,N.,N.E. & N.W. respectivly.County of Norfolk is bounded by the North Sea on the N. & E. and Survey area is in the N.E. of Norfolk. {Communications}-2 roads,B1150 & B1159 radiate from N. Walsham to Bacton & Happisburgh respectivly.Minor roads are generally narrow & sunken.Norwich is 18 miles distant,reached by B1150 in N. Walsham or A1151 in Honing. Nearest railway station is at N. Walsham,connecting area with Norwich,London & the Midlands. {Drainage}Dykes between fields drain into the Hundred Streams,thence to the River Ant & eventually reach the sea at Great Yarmouth.
